text: Paul Mucureezi (born 11 February 1993) is a Ugandan footballer who plays as a Midfielder for Vipers SC in the Uganda Premier League. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Uganda's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
